General Info: Rec Sports manages a variety of recreation spaces within Bellmont Hall. Access to these spaces is restricted to current UT students and individuals with a current Rec Sports membershipor Day Pass: https://www.utrecsports.org/memberships/day-passes . Note: Bellmont Hall requires a UT ID card for access on weekends and after 7 pm on weekdays. This means that only currently enrolled students and faculty/staff members with an active Rec Sports membership may access Bellmont Hall during these times. While Rec Sports operates recreation spaces within Bellmont Hall, Rec Sports does not have oversight of overall facility access. 2109 San Jacinto Blvd. Austin, Texas 78712 View Map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/apyEHnBp1wshQBRC8  Parking Information: https://www.utrecsports.org/facilities/parking  Facility hours vary based on the academic calendar, University holidays, and break periods. View Facility Hours: https://www.utrecsports.org/hours  Bellmont Hall spaces offer:
Features: BEL 304: Women’s Locker Room (includes dry sauna and showers)
BEL 332: Men’s Locker Room (includes dry sauna and showers)
BEL 348: Multipurpose Room (volleyball, badminton, group exercise)
